about_the_game:
Perhaps we've never escaped our fate.
"Xi" is a horror puzzle - solving game themed around modern Chinese folk customs.
The story unfolds in an old mountain mansion that has been abandoned for a long time. This immersive escape - room experience seems overly real, exuding an air of eeriness and suspicion everywhere. There's an empty banquet, corridors from which one can't find an exit. Can "you", who has strayed into this haunted house, really escape? Fortunately, there are others in this mansion. Unfortunately, those in the mansion don't seem to be human... Whose words are true? I can't tell, I really can't tell...
Was a bought - out girl betrothed to a ghost? Is it another story of a feudal remnant persecuting a girl? No, no. Perhaps the truth this time is actually simpler than you think. With a new - Chinese - style pixel art style, it restores the gloomy old mansion of a wealthy landlord in the early years of the Republic of China. A firm materialist doesn't believe in any ghosts or supernatural beings. I have strength, lots of strength... Well... Maybe I need some tricks occasionally. Anyway, can you really appease the resentment of the ghost bride, save her soul, and then get out alive? But... who is the one who really needs to be saved?
lThis is an adventure full of unknowns and... horror? No, no. Surprise? Hmm... Fright! That's right, that's right. Is it right? Ah?
It's an adventure of "Jing Xi"! Piece together the lost past and discover your own story.
Game Features:
A classic pixel - style RPG game. There are no clichéd jump scares. It embodies pure Eastern mysticism. True horror often dawns on you later.

Game content

4 character portraits

9 map scenes

Operation method

Move the character up, down, left, right on the keyboa.

Interact with characters and items based on spaces.
